snippet.title: Perennial Order | OUT NOW!! | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Perennial Order is OUT NOW on Steam, Epic Games, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S!!

Perennial Order is a 2D plant horror boss rush with challenging one-hit-death combat. Set in an atmospheric Dark Age world plagued by nature-infested horrors, explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or in two player co-op, all in a realistic painterly style.

Features local and online co-op with cross-platform play! 

Developed by Gardenfiend Games.

Steam | https://t.co/yLksRBJc2L
Epic | https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/perennial-order-d1df80 
PS5 | https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009601
Xbox | https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/perennial-order/9nsrcj7xgn11

- - - - - - - -

Twitter | https://x.com/PerennialOrder
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/perennialorder/
TikTok | https://www.tiktok.com/@perennialorder
Website | https://perennialorder.com/
